Reviews.Title: “The Hostal with the best atmosphere!”
Reviews.Author: josulf
Reviews.Content: I stayed in the hostal for two weeks last year and I will always come back ! The staff and other guest are like your family and you immedeately start feeling home. Though it is not a luxury hostal. But the atmosphere is the best of all the hostals in Playa del Carmen and the location - 2 blocks from the beach, 1-3 blocks from the party-zone- is just great! I can highly recommend every one to stay at this friendly and welcoming place!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, fun vibe”
Reviews.Author: grippyjaxx
Reviews.Content: they give u clean towels. But u dont get a key to yr room. They have to open it for u evertime which gets annoying. The room i was in smelt of smoke. watch out for sleez staff. But overall a gud hostel.

Reviews.Title: “A cool vibe”
Reviews.Author: gxqpp
Reviews.Content: I stayed here while in Playa, and I felt that the staff were really nice and friendly. The social scene was good but since its not a huge bar, even sleeping in the dorms near the rooftop bar you can still sleep. It had A.C which was great, most places in the same price range don't. I have conversational spanish, which was great because most of the staff don't speak very much English. Overall, I enjoyed my time here.

Reviews.Title: “Stay here”
Reviews.Author: gecko36
Reviews.Content: Delighted i stayed really sound staff ended up drinking with them and staying in touch too makes me wanna go back ended up staying longer then planned when i said i wanted to leave to go to a cheaper hostel because i was on tight budget they let me stay at that price the other hostel was offering it was quiet enough time of year so i dunno if it would always be like that,good location not far from anything

HotelInfo.Name: Happy Gecko Hotel & Hostel
HotelInfo.Address: 10 th av. calles 6 y 8, Playa del Carmen 77710, Mexico
